reviews.review: I have loved this game since I first started!  Valve did so well with this one.  Even though it is outdated, it doesn't matter for this game because it was and is so well made.  I HIGHLY recommend this game to anyone and everyone.  Hasn't disappointed me or anyone I have met who have played it.  Wish valve would make another portal game for everyone to enjoy.

Easy enough to pick up that I can play with my 8 year old.

Challenging enough that I struggle to understand the logic at times.

This was the perfect game 7 years ago, when it was released.

Since then, it has flourished with the Steam Workshop.

Heartily recommend to any puzzle fan.

Since I first play Portal 2, it has been one of my favorite games, if not my absolute favorite game, of all time! It's been a few years and I'm getting back into playing some community test chambers, and having a BLAST! The best first-person-shooter-puzzle-platformer ever!

And rememeber: When life gives you lemons, BURN LIFE'S HOUSE DOWN!!!
its a good game, fun to play. great with friends
What can you say about this game, it's a classic. Well written, great gameplay, fantastic voice acting, Portal 2 has it all. I could not recommend this game more.
Still fun in 2018. A must-play.

Buenísma historia (primero jugar el 1) final épico [spoiler] (SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACEE) [/spoiler] y demás cosas que lo hacen un buen juego, pero la joya de la corona es su multijugador; es divertido, gracioso, y a veces frustrante tratar con los amigos mientras se resuelven los puzzles. con workshop hay puzzles infinitos y muy difíciles. muy recomendado para cualquier pc, y, con las ofertas, para cualquier bolsillo.
It is funny, has a great story and is a nice challenge, not to hard an not to obvious. A must have for everyone
